description.ruby-sapphire:
A sharp-fanged attack.
May badly poison the foe.
description.emerald:
A sharp-fanged attack.
May badly poison the foe.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The foe is bitten
with toxic fangs.
It may also badly
poison the foe.
